name: Go Kart Drift Racing
description:
Get ready for one of the most realistic Go Cart racing game ever !

Inside Go Cart racing game, you can pass levels by drifting in the races. With more than 100 levels, a new and entertaining go cart racing experience is presented for you.
No real money! You can earn money for every drifting experience in freestyle mode and use them to unlock the cars you might have for the following races.
Get Ready and Enjoy the Go Cart Racing!
